* Introduced check interval feature for Conditioner.
* Introduced repeat limit feature for Timer and Conditioner.

* WWW class is now part of Waitress.Extras namespace.
* Introduced Active property for all waitress classes.
* Changed the type of Done event of waitresses to EventHandler<DoneEventArgs>.
* DefaultHost system is now working in the background automatically.
* No class is sealed anymore.
